line.comment: * Add-Ons 1.2: Added Kha'ak bailing, but the chances are 1/5 as usual. See !fight.attack.object.xml - only fighters can bail as of ZH.
* Add-Ons 1.3: Insane mode halves the bail multiplier, effectively halving the bail rate.
* Herobetty 5.4: Bailing a ship will award the bounty and ascension progress.
* From !ship.signal.killed: did a player's mercenary group cause the bail? If yes, set the $playerMercKill flag to [TRUE].
* Note: unlike the bounty logic in !ship.signal.killed, freighters in ZH never bail via combat. As such, no need to set the bounty of the attacker.
* START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text=$t icon=28 timeout=0 fadeout=0
* Add-Ons 1.1: Added edge case for lower difficulties when bailing a renegade fighter.
* If he doesn't bail when he has the occasion to do it once, he'll never bail.

sval.val: Add-Ons 1.2: Added Kha'ak bailing, but the chances are 1/5 as usual. See !fight.attack.object.xml - only fighters can bail as of ZH.
Add-Ons 1.3: Insane mode halves the bail multiplier, effectively halving the bail rate.
Herobetty 5.4: Bailing a ship will award the bounty and ascension progress.
From !ship.signal.killed: did a player's mercenary group cause the bail? If yes, set the $playerMercKill flag to [TRUE].
Note: unlike the bounty logic in !ship.signal.killed, freighters in ZH never bail via combat. As such, no need to set the bounty of the attacker.
START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text=$t icon=28 timeout=0 fadeout=0
Add-Ons 1.1: Added edge case for lower difficulties when bailing a renegade fighter.
If he doesn't bail when he has the occasion to do it once, he'll never bail.
